!title: Serge Lang's eggnog
!tags: Thanksgiving, recipe
!source: Prof. Serge Lang, Princeton University

This epic performance was reconstructed by Phil Bergey at Thanksgiving 2018.

* 12 eggs, separated
- Separate the eggs; put the yolks into a large serving bowl and the whites into a mixer bowl.

* 1lb. sugar
* 2qt. milk
* 1qt. heavy cream
* 700mL Remy Martin VSOP cognac
- Mix the sugar, milk, and cream into the egg yolks, then add the cognac.

* 12 egg whites
- Whip the egg whites and fold gently into the eggnog.

* nutmeg
- Grate nutmeg over top, stir gently, and serve.
